This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    24930006Vegan
    926305006Jain diet
    300928006Vegetarian
    162538009Ovo-lacto-vegetarian
    226228003Sikh diet
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 41829006 (Diet)

name: DietType
title: Diet Type
description: This value set covers : All childrens (preferred term) of finding relating to Dietary finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT
